entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Lake Ontario early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
